channel.title: VirtualBox on Rico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in VirtualBox on Rico's Blog

item.title: VirtualBox 4.3.22 and network drives
item.description: If you upgraded from VirtualBox 4.3.20 to 4.3.22 and use Vbox network shares, you may have noticed shares are reported as unmounted, even if they are available. This is a well known issue : https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=66081Â https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=66067#p312765 Solution for now is to revert to 4.3.20 (VB and extension) or wait for upcoming VirtualBox release
